string.text: Hey man, got anything to read? Being stuck in this storeroom forever sucks ass, and I can't even drink the time away lest the colonel comes down and busts my balls. Here, bring me some good reading material and we'll see if we can't build a good working relationship.
Your help is appreciated, man. We gotta keep our boys alive.
Howdy, soldier. There's been a bit more demand for where you got those magazines, especially with the boys stuck on watchtower duty. If you got any more, feel free to bring them.
Your help is appreciated, man. We gotta keep our boys alive.
